channel.title: Projects on Akshay Khairkar
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Akshay Khairkar

item.title: Credit card Application Process Automation
item.description:
• Team Members : 4
  • Project Description: We build a system to automate the offline credit card application process by making use of OCR technology to submit the application for a credit card. Developed an algorithm to provide a decision on the application and an UI in the form of a web application.
  • Role Played :
    • Studied and implemented open source OCR library “OCRAD” in the form of Ocrad.js a pure javascript version of the OCRAD project.
    • Developed an algorithm to generate applicants credit score based on parameters such as CIBIL score, financial assets, etc.

item.title: Online Book Buying Selling Portal (Database System)
item.description:
• Team Members : 5
  • Project Description: We designed a web application which basically allows users to register, post the ads,view others ads, update & delete the information pertaining to a particular item.
  • Role Played :
    • Gathered requirements for the Project.
    • Designed a Relational Database Model through Schemas, ER Diagram, Dataflow models.

item.title: Python Packet Sniffer
item.description:
• Individual Project
  • A python based network packet sniffer that captures the packet , analyzes it and displays the information such as header contents and data present in it by unpacking the packets at each layer.
